product_name: Mountain House Chicken Fried Rice - 2.5 Servings
long_description: Chicken Fried Rice makes a great feast on the trail or on the mountain. It's made with tasty long-grain rice, cooked chicken, scrambled eggs, onions, mushrooms, green peas, red peppers and carrots.
short_description: Chicken Fried Rice makes a great feast on the trail or on the mountain. It's made with tasty long-grain rice, cooked chicken, scrambled eggs, onions, mushrooms, green peas, red peppers and carrots.
